sub_title: Independent Crop Consultant associated with Cropex Group
summary:
When I enter a greenhouse, I immediately start to screen all that I see to have a good sight on the status of the plant, fruit and climate. I have a never ending energy to get the best out of these 3.
As a very young child, I already was the right hand of my father, a grower, who learned the tricks again from his father. This results in a lot of transmitted skills.
For over 15 years I had my own greenhouse (cucumbers and tomatoes). During this time I combined this with my consultancy competencies. Amongst others I gave support in setting up the biggest greenhouse in Slovenia and coached Austrian and Dutch growers.
Growing is in my DNA for many generations. Therefore it is my natural habit to be on top of all what has to do with it. I master the newest technologies and novelties. My mission is to gain the highest efficiency together with the grower.
